query:
UPDATE coach_profiles 
SET specializations = CASE 
  WHEN user_id IN (SELECT id FROM users WHERE name LIKE '%Steven%') THEN 'French,English,SLE Oral,SLE Written'
  WHEN user_id IN (SELECT id FROM users WHERE name LIKE '%Sue-Anne%') THEN 'French,English,Conversation,Oral Preparation'
  WHEN user_id IN (SELECT id FROM users WHERE name LIKE '%Erika%') THEN 'English,Exam Confidence,Performance Psychology'
  WHEN user_id IN (SELECT id FROM users WHERE name LIKE '%Soukaina%') THEN 'French,Written,Oral,SLE Preparation'
  WHEN user_id IN (SELECT id FROM users WHERE name LIKE '%Victor%') THEN 'French,BBB,CBC,Oral Simulation'
  WHEN user_id IN (SELECT id FROM users WHERE name LIKE '%Preciosa%') THEN 'English,Professional English,Executive Coaching'
  ELSE specializations
END
WHERE user_id IN (SELECT id FROM users WHERE name LIKE '%Steven%' OR name LIKE '%Sue-Anne%' OR name LIKE '%Erika%' OR name LIKE '%Soukaina%' OR name LIKE '%Victor%' OR name LIKE '%Preciosa%');
